Although many fonts confirm the accuracy of the used formula (see http://bit.ly/waterneedformula), there are no indicators about who actually invented it.
In which spectrum can the input values be?
The input values could theoretically be anything, as long as they are positive numbers. In order for the app to work properly, we have set a limit: from 0 to 500 kilograms.
What does the model assert? / How can the result be interpreted?

You can use this formula to be informed about your personal recommended water supply. Please note the results predict the general amount of liquid your body daily needs, and that is consists of water and food!
